alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 03 at 1:15PM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 inches or more possible in the most persistent lake snows. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph resulting in considerable blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Erie, Genesee, and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Narrow bands of heavy snow could impact portions of the region. Localized travel problems will be possible.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
